text: Arrival of a Train at La Ciotat is a French 1896 short black & white movie directed by Auguste Lumière and Louis Lumière. It is thought to be one of the first movies ever made. The short movie is simply about a train arriving to a station. It is about a minute long. ==Other websites== * Category:1896 movies Category:Short movies Category:French movies
title: Arrival of a Train at La Ciotat
